title: Universal Newsreel No. 44
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Berlin Wall, Berlin, Germany, 1961-1989
History/Berlin (Germany) - History - Division of East and West
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Communist state
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Communist countries
abstract: East and West Germans say goodbye to each other as the Berlin Wall is sealed once more.
description: Footage from 1964 documents the end of a 17 day pass agreement which allowed West Germans to cross the border and visit their friends and family in East Germany. The narrator notes that for most of the million and a quarter Germans who were granted passes, this is the first time they have seen friends and relatives since the wall was erected in 1961.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002607; The German Experience; Active; 2012
